pages.contact: Contact Us | CoffeeNest About us Our photos Contact us Contacts Contact us We're Here to Help You with All Your Coffee Needs Best coffee in India I accept Privacy policy Discover the Story of CoffeeNest CoffeeNest was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to create a space where coffee lovers could gather, connect, and indulge in the finest coffee blends. Our journey began in the bustling city of Nagpur, where we set out to redefine the coffee experience. Situated in the heart of Nagpur, CoffeeNest offers a convenient location for both locals and visitors to enjoy their favorite brews. Whether you're exploring the city or simply passing through, our café welcomes you with open arms. At CoffeeNest, we're not just passionate about coffee; we're dedicated to fostering a sense of community and camaraderie. Explore Our Diverse Menu Discover a World of Flavor Indulge in our extensive menu of handcrafted beverages, each meticulously prepared to tantalize your taste buds. From rich and creamy lattes to refreshing iced coffees, there's something for everyone at CoffeeNest. Come savor the experience! E-mail coffeenest@gmail.com Address Rambagh Layout, Untkhana, Nagpur, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440003, India Phone +91-673-8124619 Home Contact us Privacy policy Terms of Use Where Every Sip Tells a Story
pages.index: CoffeeNest - Unique Coffee Varieties About us Our photos Contact us Contacts Welcome to CoffeeNest Experience Unique Coffee Blends Our Journey From the very beginning, our mission has been to revolutionize the coffee experience by bringing unique and diverse blends to our patrons. Our journey started with a passion for coffee and a dream to create a place where every cup tells a story. We source our beans from the finest coffee-growing regions around the globe, ensuring that each blend is crafted with the utmost care and precision. Our dedication to quality means that from bean to cup, every step is meticulously managed to deliver an unparalleled coffee experience. Our expert baristas are trained to bring out the best in every blend, ensuring that your visit to CoffeeNest is nothing short of extraordinary. Our Coffee Our coffee beans are the heart and soul of CoffeeNest. We take pride in our meticulous selection process, sourcing beans from renowned coffee farms across the world. Each region offers its unique characteristics, and we embrace this diversity to bring you a wide range of flavors. Whether you prefer a bold, robust cup or a smooth, delicate brew, our menu has something for every coffee lover. Our blends are crafted to highlight the natural flavors of the beans, offering a rich and satisfying experience with every sip. From single-origin selections to our signature blends, each cup is a testament to our commitment to quality. We invite you to explore our offerings and find your perfect blend at CoffeeNest. Our Cozy Coffee Haven Welcome to CoffeeNest, where comfort meets exceptional coffee. Our café is designed to be a sanctuary for coffee lovers, offering a warm and inviting atmosphere where you can relax and enjoy our unique blends. Each corner of our space is crafted with care, ensuring you feel at home the moment you step in. Have Questions? Reach Out to Us! We’re here to help you with any inquiries about CoffeeNest and our unique coffee blends. Feel free to get in touch! coffeenest@gmail.com Home Contact us Privacy policy Terms of Use Where Every Sip Tells a Story
pages.privacy: CoffeeNest - Privacy Policy About us Our photos Contact us Contacts Privacy Policy Welcome to CoffeeNest's Privacy Policy. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information we receive from users of the site. Information We Collect When you use our website, we may collect information about your visit, including the pages you view, the links you click, and other actions you take. We may also collect certain standard information that your browser sends to every website you visit, such as your IP address, browser type and language, access times, and referring website addresses. Additionally, if you contact us via email, we may keep a record of that correspondence, including your email address and any other information you provide to us. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our website and services, to communicate with you, and to personalize your experience. We may also use your information to send you promotional materials, newsletters, or other communications that we believe may be of interest to you. Furthermore, we may use the information we collect to monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our website and services, to detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities, and to comply with legal obligations. Information Sharing We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as well as with our affiliates and subsidiaries. We may also disclose your information in response to legal requests or to protect our rights or property. Additionally, if CoffeeNest is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction. However, we will notify you before your personal information is transferred and becomes subject to a different privacy policy. Security We take the security of your personal information seriously and take steps to protect it from unauthorized access, use, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, and we encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Your continued use of our website after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our practices regarding your personal information, please contact us at coffeenest@gmail.com. Home Contact us Privacy policy Terms of Use Where Every Sip Tells a Story
